__e: Only one thing matters there is a child living and breathing on this earth and living and breathing because of me.
I'm only breathing now because you're talking to me.
Instead of breathing the dust of the Library... you should look more around you.
- I can't drink when I'm breathing.
I was glad to be alive and breathing the air of Paris, glad to be free at last.
One minute he was breathing, and the next minute, he just wasn't.
He goes on breathing and living until he rots.
- No, she's breathing very well on her own now.
Come on, son. Just a couple more times of doin' this, and you'll be breathin' just fine, if I live.
She don't seem to be breathing right.
